price: Nam so ma wͻyi deε Yεde ama wͻn no ho boniayε. Enti modeε monnye moani, na εnkyε biara mobɛhunu.
arabic: لِيَكۡفُرُواْ بِمَآ ءَاتَيۡنَٰهُمۡۚ فَتَمَتَّعُواْ فَسَوۡفَ تَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: liyakfurū bimā ātaynāhum fatamattaʿū fasawfa taʿlamūna
